H0.text: Which restaurant chain has supported the Venice in Peril campaign since 1975. Bella Italia

H1.text: Which restaurant chain has supported the Venice in Peril campaign since 1975. Ask Italian

H2.text: Which restaurant chain has supported the Venice in Peril campaign since 1975. Prezzo

H3.text: Which restaurant chain has supported the Venice in Peril campaign since 1975. PizzaExpress

A4.text: PizzaExpress introduced the Pizza Veneziana in 1977 to help save Venice from sinking by donating 5p of every pizza sold to the Venice in Peril Fund.

A5.text: From 2008, donations from the Veneziana pizza go to the Veneziana Fund, where 50% is donated to the Venice in Peril Fund.
